search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for RepCard (repcard.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for RepCard can be found at this URL: [https://www.repcard.com/pricing](https://www.repcard.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:

===============
   

Sales & Support: [+1 (602) 777-4030](tel:+16027774030)

Canvassing Feature
------------------

We believe amazing networking tools should be accessible to all companies, no matter the size.

Includes unlimited use of

**Q&A.** Get instant answers to your questions.

**Autofill.** Pull insights from hundreds of pages at once.

**Writer.** Brainstorm new ideas and first drafts.

###### SUPPORT

Questions & Answers
===================

[See All FAQs](https://repcard.zendesk.com/hc/en-us)

Is RepCard free to try out?

Yes, RepCard is free to try out! We have a Free Plan with limited features, that is 100% free forever. Download the app from the App Store or the Google Play Store to supercharge your sales today!

How much does RepCard cost?

Although RepCard is free to download and use, we offer three different pricing plans; Free, Premium, and Enterprise. Premium accounts cost $20/month, and we offer customized pricing for our Enterprise accounts. Schedule a demo for a customized quote!

Is there a maximum user limit?

No, we have no maximum or minimum user limit. RepCard is designed to accommodate individuals, teams, and companies of all sizes; from 1 to 10,000 users!

Does RepCard integrate with my existing CRM systems?

Yes! You can connect RepCard with your CRM through Zapier. Check if your CRM is compatible here. If it's not listed, contact our support team to see if we can establish the connection manually.

How do I turn on the Canvassing feature on my account?

Canvassing is available for our Enterprise users. Please schedule a demo with our sales team to discuss upgrading your account.
